title: Oval Dish
description: Dish, oval, in the form of a formalized medallion within a fluted border of chrysanthemum petals; two undercut floral handles; medallion boss carved with floral and foliate designs radiating from a central floral form.  Translucent camphor jade with flocculent crystalline markings.  One of a pair- 36.7.5-6.
creditline: Gift of Mr. Augustus L. Searle
